it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.model

Class DominationBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.utils.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.model.Board
        • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.model.DominationBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteObservable, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class DominationBoard
extends Board
    A Board during a Domination match. The damages to each spawn point are contained in three lists.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isDominationBoard

        public boolean isDominationBoard()
        Returns whether the Board is a DominationBoard. Always true here, always false in the parent class Board.
        Overrides:
        isDominationBoard in class Board
        Returns:
        false, since this is a DominationBoard and not a normal Board
